title: Psychopath

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, kill a player, cleaning them. Gain 1 Suspicion for each visitor of the victim.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night you do not kill anyone, you lose 1 Suspicion, and lose 1 more for each player who visits you that night.
- When you reach 5 Suspicion, you kill yourself.
- You kill your roleblockers and clean them, gaining 1 Suspicion for each player that visited you that night (other than your roleblocker).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
